title: 8 Keys Leaders Use To Achieve Greatness [SOLO ROUND] EP 1343
description:
I wanted to re-visit the 8 core principles I’ve learned from the past 10 years of journeying on this path to greatness. Here’s the truth: Principles are just words on paper if we don’t actually take consistent action to LIVE by them. So do a check in on yourself as we go through these 8 principles and see how you are living by them.

In this episode you will learn, 

  • Why you need to create a clear and purposeful vision for your life.
  • How to cultivate a champion’s mindset.
  • To turn adversity into an advantage.
  • Methods for practicing positive habits.

For more, go to lewishowes.com/1343
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
